checkForUpdatesDesc: Check if a newer version of Jan is available.
failedToRelocateDataFolderDesc: Failed to relocate data folder. Please try again.
factoryResetDesc: This will reset all app settings to their defaults. This can't be undone. We only recommend this if the app is corrupted.
documentationDesc: Learn how to use Jan and explore its features.
releaseNotesDesc: See what's new in the latest version of Jan.
discordDesc: Join our community for support and discussions.
reportAnIssueDesc: Found a bug? Help us out by filing an issue on GitHub.
creditsDesc1: Jan is built with ❤️ by the Menlo Team.
creditsDesc2: Special thanks to our open-source dependencies—especially llama.cpp and Tauri—and to our amazing AI community.

dataFolder.appDataDesc: Default location for messages and other user data.
dataFolder.appLogsDesc: View detailed logs of the App.

others.spellCheckDesc: Enable spell check for your threads.
others.resetFactoryDesc: Restore application to its initial state, erasing all models and chat history. This action is irreversible and recommended only if the application is corrupted.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.windowBackgroundDesc: Set the app window's background color.
appearance.appMainViewDesc: Set the main content area's background color.
appearance.primaryDesc: Set the primary color for UI components.
appearance.accentDesc: Set the accent color for UI highlights.
appearance.destructiveDesc: Set the color for destructive actions.
appearance.resetToDefaultDesc: Reset all appearance settings to default.
appearance.resetAppearanceSuccessDesc: All appearance settings have been restored to default.
appearance.chatWidthDesc: Customize the width of the chat view.
appearance.showLineNumbersDesc: Display line numbers in code blocks.
appearance.resetCodeBlockStyleDesc: Reset code block style to default.
appearance.resetCodeBlockSuccessDesc: Code block style has been restored to default.

hardware.name: Name
hardware.enableVulkanDesc: Use Vulkan API for GPU acceleration. Do not enable Vulkan if you have an NVIDIA GPU as it may cause compatibility issues.

httpsProxy.proxyUrlDesc: The URL and port of your proxy server.
httpsProxy.authenticationDesc: Credentials for the proxy server, if required.
httpsProxy.noProxyDesc: A comma-separated list of hosts to bypass the proxy.
httpsProxy.ignoreSslDesc: Allow self-signed or unverified certificates. This may be required for some proxies but reduces security. Only enable if you trust your proxy.
httpsProxy.proxySslDesc: Validate the SSL certificate when connecting to the proxy.
httpsProxy.proxyHostSslDesc: Validate the SSL certificate of the proxy's host.
httpsProxy.peerSslDesc: Validate the SSL certificates of peer connections.
httpsProxy.hostSslDesc: Validate the SSL certificates of destination hosts.

localApiServer.title: Local API Server
localApiServer.serverLogsDesc: View detailed logs of the local API server.
localApiServer.serverPortDesc: Port number for the API server.
localApiServer.apiKeyDesc: Authenticate requests with an API key.
localApiServer.trustedHostsDesc: Hosts allowed to access the server, separated by commas.
localApiServer.corsDesc: Allow cross-origin requests to the API server.
localApiServer.verboseLogsDesc: Enable detailed server logs for debugging.

privacy.helpUsImproveDesc: To help us improve Jan, you can share anonymous data like feature usage and user counts. We never collect your chats or personal information.
privacy.privacyPolicy: You have full control over your data. Learn more in our Privacy Policy.
privacy.analyticsDesc: To improve Jan, we need to understand how it's used—but only with your help. You can change this setting anytime.
privacy.privacyPromises: Your choice here won't change our core privacy promises:
privacy.promise1: Your conversations stay private and on your device
privacy.promise2: We never collect your personal information or chat content
privacy.promise3: All data sharing is anonymous and aggregated
privacy.promise4: You can opt out anytime without losing functionality
privacy.promise5: We're transparent about what we collect and why

general.failedToRelocateDataFolderDesc: Failed to relocate data folder. Please try again.
general.checkForUpdatesDesc: Check if a newer version of Jan is available.
general.factoryResetDesc: This will reset all app settings to their defaults. This can't be undone. We only recommend this if the app is corrupted.
general.huggingfaceTokenDesc: Your HuggingFace API token for accessing models.
general.documentationDesc: Learn how to use Jan and explore its features.
general.releaseNotesDesc: See what's new in the latest version of Jan.
general.discordDesc: Join our community for support and discussions.
general.reportAnIssueDesc: Found a bug? Help us out by filing an issue on GitHub.
general.creditsDesc1: Jan is built with ❤️ by the Menlo Team.
general.creditsDesc2: Special thanks to our open-source dependencies—especially llama.cpp and Tauri—and to our amazing AI community.

changeDataFolder.title: Change Data Folder Location
changeDataFolder.description: Are you sure you want to change the data folder location? This will move all your data to the new location and restart the application.
